Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Relates to establishing electric vehicle charging station reliability reporting and standards
Summary: Relates to establishing electric vehicle charging station reliability reporting and standards; requires entities to report and the public service commission to assess the reliability of charging stations; requires the commission to develop minimum industry operational standards for the long term maintenance, preservation, reliability, and uptime requirements of publicly funded electric vehicle charging equipment.
LawCode: Add ยง66-u, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to establishing electric vehicle charging station reliability reporting and standards
